quoteText: use Brainly Services if we have suspended your access to it, or have otherwise banned you from using it;
title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

tosdr.case: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part B, applicable to users in Europe) state that you must not "use Brainly Services if we have suspended your access to it, or have otherwise banned you from using it."
